section.p: You station yourself outside the Sovereign’s apartments and wait.

About two hours after midnight, just as the moon has risen, a black cloud comes drifting from the woods west of the city and hovers over the roof of the palace. At the same time a baleful influence can be felt settling over everything like a chill wind from a graveyard. Peering into the depths of the cloud, you are sure you can make out a monstrous squirming shape.
Make a MAGIC roll at a Difficulty of 17 .
